long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Be notified when an Amazon disbursement is available!
Our Chrome extension automatically checks your account every hour to see if your disbursement is ready.

No Need to Give Us Credentials
Our chrome extension reloads your disbursement page in the background so you don’t have to. If you get logged out we’ll notify you so you can log back in. You stay in control of your data and your money.

Stop Wasting Days and Hours Without Your Cash
We do the heavy lifting to make sure you get your disbursement as quickly as possible. We check every hour to see if your disbursement is available and as soon it is you get a desktop notification. 

Easy color Coding On Any Page
Our extension is easy to read, yellow means it’s not ready yet, red means you need to log in, and green means money! We give you a running total of how much money you can expect to get from your next disbursement.
